Here are a few shots of testing some new parts soon to be added to BrickMod. If any one has requests or suggestions, I'll do my best to work them into the update, so just let me know!

Question for you guys on adding a hatch to the pod module. I have been able to add a working hatch. It's currently just a box with a different color, but I feel like this sort of breaks the "LEGO" visual. So, my question is this;

Does it matter that adding a hatch sort of changes the LEGO-ness of the BrickPod part? How does everyone feel about Brick craft as far as crew goes? Is it important to you to have a crew on your Brick craft, or would you be fine with unmanned craft? I definitely plan on creating parts that will have working hatches, but I would like to use parts that are more suitable than a nose cone and wont require me to alter the..."LEGO-ness" of the part. Help me decide.
